mapper.select: select * from subcategory order by subcategory_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into subcategory(subcategory_id, name, price, detail) values(seq_subcategory.nextval, #{name}, #{price}, #{detail})
mapper.update: update subcategory set name=#{name}, price=#{price}, detail=#{detail} where subcategory_id=#{subcategory_id}
